flawed_nl_solution:
At first Jeff paid, $300/month x 12 months = $<<300*12=3600>>3600/year
He paid $3600/year x 3 years = $10800 the firsts 3 years.
The final 2 years he paid $350/month x 12 months = $<<350*12=4200>>4200/year
He paid $4200/year x 2 years = $<<4200*2=84000>>84000 the last 2 years.
He paid the owner $10800 + $84000 = $<<10800+84000=94800>>94800 in total.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8400, not 84000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
